eas_text: A civil authority has issued A CIVIL EMERGENCY MESSAGE for the following counties or areas: North Dakota; at 05:29 AM ON JAN 8, 2026 Effective until 06:29 AM. Message from WSLF/CAP.
extra_text:
A Silver Alert is being issued by NDHP and ND BCI at the request of the West Fargo Police Department.  Zuya Armstrong of West Fargo, North Dakota is an 18 year old Native American male.  
He is 5 feet 7 inches tall, weighs 135 pounds and has black, longer length shaggy hair and brown eyes.  
His last known whereabouts were on 1/7/2026 at 10:00 pm at 921 10th Ave W, West Fargo, North Dakota.

Zuya is considered a vulnerable adult. He was last seen wearing a black hooded sweatshirt and grey sweatpants. 

If you have any information regarding this incident, please contact the Red River Regional Dispatch Center at 701-451-7660.

The above Silver Alert information is available to the public by calling 5 1 1 and at www.ndresponse.gov/alert
